1689060.name: Endless Soul Light Solitaire
1689060.description:
In the magical land of Liveria, the stones, trees, rivers, winds, animals, birds, and all other living beings have a glimmering light inside - their soul. Some hide it, others leave it in plain sight. Each soul has a color. Everyone has a soulmate with the same soul color, and nobody is ever lonely. Two rivers merge into one, and trees intertwine their crowns...
This story is about Phyro, a little moth looking for a soulmate in every light she sees, but she can't find what she's looking for. She meets different unique creatures who join her on her quest. Together, these friends are about to have an incredible adventure.

Solve 200 card patterns at various levels of difficulty and help the Liverians find their lost souls!

- A story about finding soulmates!
- Atmospheric levels with many fantastic backgrounds!
- Engaging and intuitive gameplay!
- Build up the biggest combos to get bonuses!
- Oodles of bonuses and in-game helpers!
- 200 fantastic card patterns!
- Challenge yourself as you overcome obstacles!
1689060.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 荷兰语, 俄语
